title: KC & The Sunshine Band Dance Remixes
description:
KC & The Sunshine Dance Remixes

Ok folks.  This is one continuous play CD.  The CD is meant to be listened to,
or danced to, as one long continuous song.   I ripped the disc to flac using EAC.
It is one file but if you choose to burn this to a disc, the cue sheet will create 
individual tracks but you won&#039;t hear the gaps at all---it will play as a continuous
track.  Or you can use a program like Medieval Cue Splitter to extract the tracks, (it&#039;s a free program.) This is a fun CD.  I hope you enjoy it.  That&#039;s the way uh huh, uh huh, I like it....  ( I detected one very small pop in the rip even after cleaning the disc  It&#039;s about 44 seconds in. )

More about flac:
sourceforge.net
dbpoweramp.com
exactaudiocopy.de
